text: rabukum -ayha alnas- 'aelam bima fi dmayrkm min khayr wshr. 'iina takun 'iradtkm wmqasdkm mrdat allah wama yqrbkm 'ilyh, fa'iinah kan -sbhanh- llrajeyn 'iilayh fi jmye al'awqat ghfwrana, fman ealim allah 'anah lays fi qalbih 'iilaa al'inabt 'iilayh wmhbth, fa'iinah yaefu enh, wayaghfir lah ma yuearid min sghayr aldhnwb, mimaa hu min mqtda altbaye albshryt
